channel.title: Machine learning on Sylvain Le Corff
channel.description: Recent content in Machine learning on Sylvain Le Corff

item.title: Data sciences material
item.description: GdR ISIS seminar Apprentissage profond et modeles generatifs pour modeliser l’incertitude des donnees Julyan Arbel: Understanding Priors in Bayesian Neural Networks at the Unit Level Nicolas Brosse: Uncertainties for classification tasks in Deep Neural Networks: a last layer approach Gianni Franchi: Tracking deep neural network weight distributions Data sciences working group Session 1: From machine learning basics to Feed Forward Neural Networks Session 2: Optimization for machine/deep learning
